verses.refrain: "Hold fast till I come;" sweet promises of heaven- "The kingdom restored, to you shall be given." "Come, enter My joy, sit down on My throne; Bright crowns are in waiting; hold fast till I come."
verses.verse: We'll "watch unto prayer" with lamps burning bright; He comes to all others a "thief in the night." We know He is near, but know not that day- As spring shows that summer is not far away.
Yes! This is our hope, 'tis built on His word- The glorious appearing of Jesus, our Lord; Of promises all, it stands as the sum: "Behold I come quickly, hold fast till I come."
